abstract: While New York’s attorney general-elect, Eric Schneiderman, may take a more moderate approach than his predecessors, he could go after rating agencies and credit card companies
snippet: While New York’s attorney general-elect, Eric Schneiderman, may take a more moderate approach than his predecessors, he could go after rating agencies and credit card companies
lead_paragraph: Eric Schneiderman speaking at an election rally in New York last month.

headline.main: The New Sheriff on Wall Street

byline.original: By Susanne Craig and Peter Lattman
